name: @webreflection/custom-elements
description: All inclusive customElements polyfill for every browser

scripts.build: node bundle/build.js && npm run rollup && npm run copy && npm run patch && npm run delete && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.copy: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi @webreflection ISC */' > index.js && cat tmp.js >> index.js
scripts.patch: sed -i.bck 's/new Promise/new Lie/; s/.*setPrototypeOf.*HTMLBuiltIn.*//' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck

author: Andrea Giammarchi
